benchmark_details.name: DECODA-v2-aug (DECODA Version 2 with Augmented Data)
benchmark_details.overview: This study proposes a new dataset version with increased annotated data standardized for research on task-oriented dialogue summarization, focusing on enhancing summary faithfulness by integrating task-specific elements into the summarization process.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To enhance dialog summarization faithfulness by integrating task-specific elements and creating a new annotated dataset for task-oriented dialogue summarization.

data.source: DECODA corpus with augmented summaries generated by ChatGPT-3.5.
data.annotation: Task-oriented dialogue summaries enhanced by data augmentation methods using LLM.

methods: Automatic evaluation with BARThez and WhisperX
methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the generated summaries compared to reference summaries.
methodology.interpretation: Higher values in metrics indicate better summary accuracy and faithfulness.
methodology.validation: Automatic evaluation and comparison against various thresholds for summary selection.
